question.text:
Tobacco contains nicotine which stimulates _____X______ to release ________Y_________ into blood circulation, which increases blood pressure and rate of heart beat.

Select the correct option for X and Y.

options.text: both <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></mrow></mfenced><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text: Tobacco contains nicotine which stimulates the adrenal medulla gland to release adrenaline or nor-adrenaline hormone into blood circulation, which increases blood pressure and rate of heartbeat.
